context: Do you know of any movies related to Little Miss Sunshine?
resp: Yes! Similar movies to Little Miss Sunshine are Soul Men, Serving Sara, and Mr. Bean's Holiday.

context.content: Hi there! Do you have a preference for a specific genre or type of book?
I love lighthearted comedy and heartwarming romance films. I'm really excited to hear your recommendations!
context.feelings: I'm filled with anticipation to discover new movies and experience heartwarming romance and lighthearted comedy. I can't wait to hear the recommendations!

context.content: Great! Based on your preference for lighthearted comedy and heartwarming romance, I recommend "Me Before You" by Jojo Moyes. It's a touching and heartwarming love story with a touch of humor. I think you'll enjoy it!
Can you tell me more about "Me Before You"? I'd love to know about the lighthearted comedy and heartwarming romance elements in the movie.
context.feelings: I'm not sure if "Me Before You" has enough lighthearted comedy for me. I'll ask for more details before making a decision. The recommender seems knowledgeable, but I need to make sure the movie fits all my preferences.

context.content: "Me Before You" is a romantic drama that follows the story of Louisa Clark, a quirky and lighthearted young woman who becomes a caregiver for Will Traynor, a wealthy and adventurous man who becomes paralyzed after an accident. The movie beautifully combines heartwarming romance with moments of lighthearted comedy as the two characters form a deep and meaningful connection. It's a touching and emotional story that will leave you with a warm heart.

That sounds like the perfect movie for me! I'm really excited to watch "Me Before You"! It sounds like it has the perfect blend of lighthearted comedy and heartwarming romance. I can't wait to experience the emotional journey of the characters. [END]
context.feelings: I'm really excited to watch "Me Before You"! It sounds like it has the perfect blend of lighthearted comedy and heartwarming romance. I can't wait to experience the emotional journey of the characters. [END]
